parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of bodies for the bodies enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of bodies of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of bodies returned from the list; this value can be less than Celt if you request more bodies than exist, or it can be NULL if no more bodies exist

title: IEnumBodies2.Next
description: Gets the next body in the bodies enumeration.
signature:
void Next( 
   System.Int32
Celt
,
   out Body2
Rgelt
,
   out System.Int32
PceltFetched
)

parameters.name: Celt
parameters.description: Number of bodies for the bodies enumeration

parameters.name: Rgelt
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of bodies of size Celt

parameters.name: PceltFetched
parameters.description: Pointer to the number of bodies returned from the list; this value can be less than Celt if you request more bodies than exist, or it can be NULL if no more bodies exist

remarks: For use in in-process DLLs only.
